Articles.Content:
So, are they possible? i had some bad missiles already but the update just scrooged them up :/

Someone has a download link to a working straight missile in 1.0? or that hasn't been worked yet?

Thanks for your time ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Spectre

I will try for a few minutes, Gotta go to bed soon. 

They Should work, Should be easier with Fairings. What is the current problem with the missiles?
Mission failure. All 10 minutes of effort failed. Will continue tomorrow.

> 
> Mission failure. All 10 minutes of effort failed. Will continue tomorrow.

Affirmative, take a nap 

But seriously now, its just me or all the rocket models i had started to fail? i mean they were pretty bad but now... they are just... i dont know, garbage?
Put a LES on something, turn on part clipping and put another rotated 180Ã‚Â°. That kind of missile?
